synopsis.text:
Egyptian evil Anubis, vanquished centuries ago by Yugi's enigmatic other self, the Pharaoh, has resurfaced, thirsting for vengeance. With the might of the Eighth Millennium Item at his disposal, Anubis sets his sights on obliterating Yugi and seizing control of the world. Meanwhile, the Battle City tournament concludes, and an ancient force stirs beneath Egypt's desert sands.

Yugi Moto, renowned as the "King of Games" thanks to the Pharaoh's power, finds himself confronted by his longtime rival, Seto Kaiba. Armed with new, formidable cards, Kaiba aims to finally triumph over Yugi. Amidst this rivalry, the Pyramid of Light, an artifact bearing an uncanny likeness to the Millennium Puzzle, captures Yugi and his friends' attention.

As Yugi and Kaiba prepare for their epic showdown, a mysterious force looms. With the Pharaoh's cunning strategies and the might of the Egyptian God Cards at his disposal, will Yugi be able to halt the ultimate enemy? Meanwhile, Yugi, Joey, and Tristan navigate the Millennium Puzzle, seeking a way to defeat Anubis. As the fate of the Earth hangs in the balance, Yugi's mastery of "Duel Monsters" faces its most significant challenge yet.
